text: Nyang laen teuma saboh kaphilah Di kaphilah nyoe napsu keu aman Teumakot jih nyan keu bandua blah Aman bak gata ngon bak kawom jih Bandua di jih napsu peusiblah Watee jimaba woe jih bak kaphe Seunang that ate jikaphe bagah Awak nyan meu han jidong diluwa Dame ngon gata pih tan jipeugah Han jitheun jaroe jih ateuh gata Nyan musoh gata jih bek takeubah Tadrop ngon tapoh pat nyang tateumee Bandum jih teuntee ek tapeurintah Kamoe bri jih nyan bandum keu gata Ek takuasa jih bek takeubah
